snippet: Coach Red Berenson, whose Michigan team defeated Michigan State, 5-0, in an outdoor game at the Big House in 2010, gave the 2013 Winter Classic venue his full endorsement.
abstract: Coach Red Berenson, whose Michigan team defeated Michigan State, 5-0, in an outdoor game at the Big House in 2010, gave the 2013 Winter Classic venue his full endorsement.

headline.main: Berenson Has Plenty of Praise for the Big House
